thread.title: Universal Translation Services reviewed by Jeff Daniels

author: Jeff Daniels
title: Universal Translation Services reviewed by Jeff Daniels
text: Fast service, they provided certified translation at only $20 per page for my birth certificate. Translation was ready in just a few hours.
